generateRole(uint8,address).custom:effects: - Does not modify any state, pure function
generateRole(uint8,address).custom:internal-logic: - Combines the roleName and roleTargetContract using abi.encodePacked - Applies keccak256 hash function to generate a unique bytes32 identifier
generateRole(uint8,address).custom:security-considerations: - Ensures unique role identifiers for different contracts - Relies on the uniqueness of contract addresses and role names
generateRole(uint8,address).details: Generates a unique role identifier based on the role name and target contract address

params.roleName: The name of the role (from ContractSpecificRoles enum)
params.roleTargetContract: The address of the contract the role is for

params.account: The account to which the Admin role will be granted
